creator: davi@apache.org
text:
In ap_rgetline_core() if the brigade (ctx->bb) contais only an EOS bucket after
the ap_get_brigade() call, the for loop will stop and last_char will be read
without being properly itialized.

creator: davi@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18083
initialize last_char with zero

Committed to trunk as r394070 (http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs?rev=394070&view=rev).
Thanks.
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:

(http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs?rev=394653&view=rev).
